casebody.data:
IN RE Application of DAYTON POWER & LIGHT CO. 2017-0241 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 12, 2018

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISION

On appellant's motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. O'DONNELL, J., dissents.

ANITA LASTER MAYS, J., of the Eighth District Court of Appeals, sitting for O'NEILL, J.
